metadata.name: DGFamily Glass Box #1
metadata.description:
The Glass Box is the gateway to the DGFamily. The Glass Box is transparent, yet you can’t see what it really holds. It could be anything: Black, Gold, or even the ultra rare Platinum. In time, you will be able to reveal its true nature…

Randomly reveal the Box's tier through an on-chain process at a future date. Glass Boxes default to Black Box benefits.

[View more details UNXD](https://drops.unxd.com/dgfamily/)
